mapper.insert: insert into oa_teamwork_inst (i_id, i_teamwork_id, i_teamwork_set_id, i_bus_model_id, i_bus_function_id, i_version, i_busdata_id, i_order ) values (null, #{iTeamworkId}, #{iTeamworkSetId}, #{iBusModelId}, #{iBusFunctionId}, #{iVersion}, #{iBusdataId}, #{iOrder} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_teamwork_inst SET i_teamwork_set_id = #{iTeamworkSetId},i_teamwork_id = #{iTeamworkId},i_bus_model_id = #{iBusModelId} ,i_bus_function_id = #{iBusFunctionId},i_version = #{iVersion},i_busdata_id = #{iBusdataId} where i_id = #{iId}
mapper.select: select max(i_order) from oa_teamwork_inst where i_teamwork_id = #{iteamworkId}
select count(*) from oa_teamwork_set where i_teamwork_id = #{iteamworkId}
select MAX(i_order) from oa_teamwork_inst where i_teamwork_id = #{iteamworkId}

select count(1) from oa_teamwork_inst c
c.i_order =1
and c.i_id = #{iId}
and c.i_teamwork_id = #{iTeamworkId}
and c.i_teamwork_set_id = #{iTeamworkSetId}
and c.i_version = #{iVersion}
order by
c.i_teamwork_set_id
c.i_teamwork_set_id desc,
c.i_version,
c.i_version desc,
c.i_teamwork_id
c.i_teamwork_id desc,
1=1

select * from oa_teamwork_inst c
and c.i_teamwork_id = #{oaTeamworkInst.iTeamworkId}
and c.i_teamwork_set_id = #{oaTeamworkInst.iTeamworkSetId}
and c.i_version = #{oaTeamworkInst.iVersion}
order by
c.i_teamwork_set_id
c.i_teamwork_set_id desc,
c.i_version,
c.i_version desc,
c.i_teamwork_id
c.i_teamwork_id desc,
1=1
select max(i_order) from oa_teamwork_inst where i_teamwork_id =#{iteamworkId} GROUP BY i_version
select i_busdata_id from oa_teamwork_inst where i_bus_function_id = #{iBusFunctionId} and i_version = #{iVersion}
